Segment.name: S5
Segment.comment: To specify stop-off detail reference numbers and stop reason

Field.name: StopSequenceNumber
Field.comment: Identifying number for the specific stop and the sequence in which the stop is to be performed

Field.name: StopReasonCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the reason for the stop

Field.name: NumberOfUnitsShipped
Field.comment: Numeric value of units shipped in manufacturer's shipping units for a line item or transaction set

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

Field.name: AccomplishCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the status of a specified stop
